items.text: Windscreen wiper/washer system, headlight cleaning system: check function
Horn: check function
Tyres: check tyre pressure (TPM)
Diagnostic system: read out fault memory; reset maintenance interval
Check actuator travel of brake shoes
Vehicles with Connect: Resetting Smart Service values for the replaced components
Particle filter: replace filter element
12V battery vent hose: Checking condition
Check front lid lock and safety hook of the front lid to ensure that they are secure and function properly
Replace air intake pre-filter
Windscreen wiper/washer system: check fluid level; check window cleaner and antifreeze, depending on the season, use Porsche approved windscreen cleaner only
Warning sticker: Check for presence and replace missing stickers (only warning stickers in visible area)
Visual inspection: Service Disconnect (high-voltage system maintenance connector) for soiling and damage
Check wiper blades
All headlights: check adjustment
Radiator and air intakes (including charge-air intakes under rear lid): visual inspection for external contamination and blockage
Brake system: check brake pads and brake discs for wear (without removing wheels)
Service and maintain convertible top
Service and maintain sunroof
Service and maintain Targa roof
Drain engine oil
Change oil filter
Tyres: check condition
Brake lines: visual inspection for damage, routing and corrosion
Brake hoses: visual inspection for damage
Drive shafts: visual inspection of the boots for leaks and damage
All-wheel final drive: change oil
PDK transmission: change transmission oil
Fill in engine oil
Coolant: check level and antifreeze

Remote control, front seats, electric parking brake and foot brake (also actuation travel), engine, clutch, steering, transmission, ParkAssist, cruise control, PSM switch, PASM switch, Sport switch, mode-switch, lift-switch, sports exhaust system, door mirror fold-in function, heating, air conditioning and instruments: check function
Oils, fluids: visual inspection for leaks
Replace spark plugs
Seat belts: check function and condition
Door locks: check function
Brake system: check brake pads and brake discs for wear
Underbody panels: visual inspection for completeness, secure installation and damage
Visual inspection for leaks from underneath (oils and other fluids)
Steering gear: visual inspection of the bellows for damage
Tie rod joints: check play and dust bellows
Axle joints: visually inspect the dust boots for damage
Rear-axle steering: check bellows, dust boots and play on joints
Exhaust system: Visual inspection for leaks and damage, check brackets
Fuel lines and connections: visual inspection
Air cleaner: replace filter elements
Check that the threaded connections of the drive shafts on the front axle are secure
Controlled all-wheel drive: change oil
PDK transmission: change clutch fluid (ATF)
Ancillary unit mounts and chassis: visual inspection of all rubber mounts for damage
PDCC: Replacing filter insert in rear-axle valve block
Change brake fluid (use only original Porsche brake fluid)
Prepare condition report for long-life guarantee
Tyre sealing compound: check use-by date and replace if necessary
